## Context.debug() method

Wrap the debug statement so that it always print out the context name as the prefix

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected debug(...args: unknown[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  args | unknown\[\] | Arguments for the debug |

**Returns:**

void
